greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative function defined by a(1)=1, a(2)=0, a(2^r) = phi(2^r) (r>1), a(p^r) = phi(p^r) (p odd prime, r>=1), where phi is Euler's function A000010.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = if n mod 4 = 2 then 0 else A000010(n). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 13 2012
program: a080736 n = if n `mod` 4 == 2 then 0 else a000010 n
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 08 2003
ext: More terms and PARI code from _Klaus Brockhaus_, Mar 10 2003
